ca.mcgill.hs.classifiers.location
Class Observation

java.lang.Object
  ca.mcgill.hs.classifiers.location.Observation
Direct Known Subclasses:
GPSObservation, WifiObservation
public abstract class Observation
extends java.lang.Object

Contains observations, derived from sensor data. Observations form the basis of Locations.

          Epsilon is the maximum distance between two points for them to be considered neighbours.
